#summary ThreadSanitizer for Microsoft Windows

We have a *work-in-progress* version of ThreadSanitizer for Windows. 
This version is based on [http://www.pintool.org PIN].

= Installation =

Download the fresh *tsan-rxxx-x86-windows-sfx.exe* from ThreadSanitizerBuildBot and execute it in the directory where you want to install it (e.g. *c:/*). 

This binary is a self-extracting archive built with [http://www.7-zip.org/ 7z]. 
You can extract it to a specified directory using 
{{{
tsan-rxxx-x86-windows-sfx.exe x -oc:/your/dir
}}}

= Usage =
On windows, you need to run ThreadSanitizer like this (assuming you installed it in *c:/*):
{{{
c:\tsan-x86-windows\tsan.bat -- your-test.exe
}}}

For other details see the main ThreadSanitizer page.
